price: Shĩ ne wanda ke sassaukar da ãyõyi bayyanannu ga Bãwan Sa, dõmin Ya fitar da ku daga duffai zuwa ga haske, kuma lalle Allah haƙĩƙa Mai tausayi ne gare ku, Mai jin ƙai.
arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُنَزِّلُ عَلَىٰ عَبۡدِهِۦٓ ءَايَٰتِۭ بَيِّنَٰتٖ لِّيُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنَ ٱلظُّلُمَٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُمۡ لَرَءُوفٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: huwa alladhī yunazzilu ʿalā ʿabdihi āyātin bayyinātin liyukh'rijakum mina al-ẓulumāti ilā al-nūri wa-inna al-laha bikum laraūfun raḥīmun
translations: that He may bring you out
